thread.title: These Tech Companies Are Enduring a Rough 2015
thread.title_full: These Tech Companies Are Enduring a Rough 2015

title: These Tech Companies Are Enduring a Rough 2015
text: These Tech Companies Are Enduring a Rough 2015 By Seung Lee 2 hours 40 minutes ago Font size: https://www.flickr.com/photos/justinwdavis/3741382967 With 2015 more than three-quarters over, it's safe to say some companies have had a tremendous year (looking at you, Amazon), while some others would like to just forget it and move on to 2016—if they are even alive by then, of course. Here are six companies that have faltered in the past nine months: Twitter:…
